arts.ttl: Portugal vs Ireland – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Portugal are set to welcome the Republic of Ireland to Lisbon’s Estádio José Alvalade this evening. This crucial 2026 World Cup qualifier is a chance for Roberto Martínez’s men to continue their flawless start to the campaign. After a challenging September, Heimir Hallgrímsson’s side are aiming to steady their campaign. arts.ttl: Portugal vs Ireland – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: Portugal host the Republic of Ireland in a pivotal 2026 FIFA World Cup European qualifier at Estádio José Alvalade, Lisbon, on Saturday. Roberto Martínez’s side aim to maintain their perfect start, while Heimir Hallgrímsson’s Ireland seek a stabilising result after a bruising September window. Portugal vs Ireland – Match Preview and Team News Date: 11th October, […] The post Portugal vs Ireland – Match preview and team news first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Portugal vs Ireland Broadcast – Time and Channel to Watch the Match
arts.sum: Portugal will face Ireland this Saturday at 8:45 p.m., CET. The match will be held at the José Alvalade Stadium as part of the 2026 World Cup qualifiers. Three Paris Saint-Germain players are involved in this match, all on the Portuguese side: Nuno Mendes (23-year-old left-back), Vitinha (25-year-old midfielder), and Gonçalo Ramos (24-year-old striker).
